front.title: YANG Data Model for Intra-domain and Inter-domain Source Address Validation(SAVNET)

abstract.t: This document describes a YANG data model for Intra-domain and Inter-domain Source Address Validation (SAVNET). The model serves as a base framework for configuring and managing an SAV subsystem, including SAV rule and SAV Tables, and expected to be augmented by other SAV technology models accordingly. Additionally, this document also specifies the model for the SAV Static application.
